text: John Whitfield J Carswell (1887 - date of death unknown), was a Scottish international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== He won a bronze medal in the pairs at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, with George Budge. ==Personal life== He was a grain merchant by trade and was born and lived in Dalbeattie. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:Date of death unknown Category:Bowls players at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Scotland Category:Scottish male bowls players
title: John Carswell (bowls)
